'''[[CyberLink]] PowerDVD''' is a commercial [[video player (software)|video player]] and [[music player (software)|music player]] for [[Microsoft Windows]] and [[Turbolinux]] [http://www.turbolinux.com/products/desktop/fuji.html]. It enables the viewing of [[High-Definition Video]] and [[DVD-Video]] movies on the user's [[Personal Computer|PC]]. The player can also be used to play videos and audio/music files in other formats encoded with different [[codec]]s, for instance [[WMV-HD]], [[DivX]], [[XviD]], and DVD-Audio, [[MP3]] and [[Advanced Audio Coding|AAC]] audio. The software offers full [[Blu-ray Disc]] and [[HD DVD]] playback with menus, with [[CPRM]] [[DRM]] support. However, [[HD DVD]] support is dropped with the release of PowerDVD 8.
'''[[CyberLink]] PowerDVD''' is a commercial [[video player (software)|video player]] and [[music player (software)|music player]] for [[Microsoft Windows]] and [[Turbolinux]] [http://www.turbolinux.com/products/desktop/fuji.html]. It enables the viewing of [[High-Definition Video]] and [[DVD-Video]] movies on the user's [[Personal Computer|PC]]. The player can also be used to play videos and audio/music files in other formats encoded with different [[codec]]s, for instance [[WMV-HD]], [[DivX]], [[XviD]], and DVD-Audio, [[MP3]] and [[Advanced Audio Coding|AAC]] audio. The software offers full [[Blu-ray Disc]] and [[HD DVD]] playback with menus, with [[CPRM]] [[DRM]] support. However, [[HD DVD]] support is dropped with the release of PowerDVD 8.
